tasks.task: Analyzing Quick Hitch Manufacturers and Features
subtasks: Identifying the manufacturers of six quick hitches (Work Saver, John Deer Eye Match, Tar River, Land Pride, Nortec, Spiko)
Describing the general construction differences, such as cross bracing and weight-bearing components
Explaining the adjustability of top hooks and their compatibility with three-point hitch attachments
Measuring and comparing the weight of each quick hitch model
Discussing the necessity and cost of bushings for category one quick hitches, highlighting Spiko's advantage
Comparing dimensions (outside to outside and inside to inside) of each quick hitch model
Highlighting color options and customization possibilities
Promoting the Spiko quick hitch for cost savings and convenience
